Michigan has led the way, through a grassroots movement of people from across the political spectrum, to set an example for the country in ending partisan gerrymandering, and demanding better for our system.

Today is a day to celebrate freedom for all Americans, and a reminder of the need to always fight for equality and justice. #Juneteenth

Today we celebrate #Juneteenth, the anniversary of the day that chattel slavery finally ended in the United States. On June 19, 1865, slaves in Texas were notified of their freedom, two years after the Emancipation Proclamation took effect.
